text: <@U61NXB13P> Last day of the e-mentor program - just wondered if you had any more questions that I can help you with?

Sorry for the late response Christian, I've been really busy with coursework and summer schools. You have been such an amazing support and it has been great getting to know more about your job as it has truly fascinated and inspired me. You have changed the way I thought about my future research into the career I wish to go into and have recommended some great books which I can't wait to read. Thank you so much, wish you all the best and if I have any further questions is there an email I could approach you by?

No trouble - coursework takes priority! It's been great talking to you, glad to know it has helped in some way. Of course you can get in touch if you have any questions in the future, my email is <mailto:christian.jeffery@gmail.com|christian.jeffery@gmail.com>, would be happy to discuss anything. Best of luck with the rest of summer school!
